title: How to see total views for a song on Spotify - Quora

response.answer_text: What do you mean by views? in Spotify there are listens.If that’s what you’re after, you can see total listens for only the top 10 popular tracks made by an artist.To see this just go to an artist page, it’ll be right there at the top.

You can’t find total views for a song on Spotify. They don’t show this particular metric. What you can find – number of streams/plays, listeners and followers. These stats are updated once a day at approximately 3pm EST.
